## SendableLiquity.repayZUSD() method

Adjust existing Trove by repaying some of its debt.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
repayZUSD(amount: Decimalish): Promise<SentLiquityTransaction<S, LiquityReceipt<R, TroveAdjustmentDetails>>>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                                   | Description                  |
| --------- | -------------------------------------- | ---------------------------- |
| amount    | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md) | The amount of ZUSD to repay. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[SentLiquityTransaction](./lib-base.sentliquitytransaction.md)<!-- -->&lt;S, [LiquityReceipt](./lib-base.liquityreceipt.md)<!-- -->&lt;R, [TroveAdjustmentDetails](./lib-base.troveadjustmentdetails.md)<!-- -->&gt;&gt;&gt;

## Remarks

Equivalent to:

```typescript
adjustTrove({ repayZUSD: amount })

```
